trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A ProfileInfoCollection object contains <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects that represent user profiles from a data source.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un oggetto ProfileInfoCollection <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>gli oggetti che rappresentano i profili utente da un'origine dati.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>

trans-unit.source: A ProfileInfoCollection is returned from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un ProfileInfoCollection il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>e i <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>metodi di un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ProfileInfoCollection can be supplied to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method to delete profile information and properties from the data source.
trans-unit.target: È possibile fornire un ProfileInfoCollection al <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>metodo per eliminare le informazioni sul profilo e le proprietà dell'origine dati.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new, empty <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto vuoto <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> is constructed by profile provider implementers and returned from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>viene costruito da implementatori di provider di profili e restituito dal <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>e i <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>metodi della <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>classe astratta.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Add method is commonly used by profile-provider implementers to populate a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> to return from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Add è comunemente utilizzato per i responsabili dell'implementazione di provider di profili per popolare un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>restituisca il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, o il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>classe astratta.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: A object with the same value as profileInfo already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto oggetto con lo stesso valore come profileInfo esiste già nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: profileInfo is .
trans-unit.target: profileInfois .

trans-unit.source: -or- The property of profileInfo is .
trans-unit.target: -or- The property of profileInfo is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetti dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref> in una matrice unidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to copy <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to the specified <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per copiare <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>gli oggetti a specificato <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Array>deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero nella matrice da cui iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref> in una matrice unidimensionale di tipo <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to copy <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo utilizza <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per copiare <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>oggetti nella matrice specificata.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale di tipo <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero di `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetti nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetti nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore che può scorrere il <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Gli enumeratori consentono solo la lettura dei dati nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile utilizzare enumeratori per modificare la raccolta sottostante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>per l'intero <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the profile info collection is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta di informazioni sul profilo è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Application code does not normally use this property.
trans-unit.target: Il codice dell'applicazione non utilizza in genere questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, because thread-safe profile info collections are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, poiché le raccolte di informazioni sul profilo thread-safe non sono supportate.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object in the collection, referenced by the specified <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta, a cui fa riferimento specificato <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*> of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>del <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto da recuperare dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object for the specified user name.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto per il nome utente specificato.

trans-unit.source: If name is not found in the collection, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se il nome non è stato trovato nella raccolta, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object with the specified user name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto con il nome utente specificato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*> of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>del <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Makes the contents of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref> read-only.
trans-unit.target: Rende il contenuto del <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref> sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: The SetReadOnly method marks the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> as read-only so that <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects cannot be added to or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetReadOnly contrassegna il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>come di sola lettura in modo che <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>Impossibile aggiunto o rimosso dalla raccolta di oggetti.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling the SetReadOnly method, you cannot change the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> back to read/write.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato il metodo SetReadOnly, non è possibile modificare il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>alla lettura/scrittura.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the synchronization root.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la radice di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Application code does not normally use this property.
trans-unit.target: Il codice dell'applicazione non utilizza in genere questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_this" name="this" href=""></xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Me" name="Me" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), because synchronization of <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"></xref> objects is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_this" name="this" href=""> </xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Me" name="Me" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic), perché la sincronizzazione dei <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection"> </xref> oggetti non è supportata.
